caption: A solemn moment of divine offering, where Christ elevates the sacred bread amidst awestruck disciples, embodying eternal love and humility.
image_prompt: A richly detailed Renaissance-style painting depicting Christ at the Last Supper, clad in deep indigo and crimson robes, holding the consecrated bread aloft. His disciples surround Him, their faces illuminated with reverence and awe, as if sensing the weight of eternity. The scene is bathed in a soft, golden light, evoking a sacred atmosphere. In the foreground, a figure kneels in full surrender, mirroring Saint Francis' devotion, symbolizing the soul's submission to divine grace. The background features subtle hints of heavenly radiance, suggesting the mystical union between heaven and earth.
